articles.title: What does a bus interchange supervisor in Singapore do? Meet this women who gave up a fashion job for public transportation - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Why did this young Singaporean woman choose to step out of a luxury fashion boutique to work at a bus interchange? CNA Women speaks to Norlin Abu about her unique career journey in this instalment of our series on women who have made extreme job switches.
articles.content: She also frequently finds herself having to help customers find items they may have lost on the buses. The lost items are usually wallets and bags, but we also have very unusual requests to locate fr… [+1417 chars]

articles.title: Philippines moves closer to building world's largest solar project - ฺBangkok Post
articles.description: Solar Philippines has submitted offers to contract most of its planned 10 gigawatts of projects, including the world’s largest, as the Southeast Asian nation seeks to meet rising demand for electricity while shifting away from coal.
